title: Hero Company
synopsis: A hero is a job that in the face of danger and adversity or from a position of weakness, display courage and the will for self-sacrifice. Would you like to work as such a hero in our company? You may transform, manipulate a huge robot or fight as a squad. Shall we realize your dream in our "Hero Company"?!
characters: ['Hyuuga, Hikaru', 'Kiba, Kihan', 'Tsurugi, Saki', 'Busou, Shun', 'Hadou, Daichi', 'Amano, Ginga', 'Amano, Mother', 'Valentine, Kakao']
voices: ['Fuchigami, Mai', 'Konishi, Katsuyuki', 'Lynn', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Irino, Miyu', 'Inoue, Kikuko', 'Seki, Tomokazu']
staff: [['Shirahata, Nobuo', ['Director']], ['Hirota, Mitsutaka', ['Script']], ['Shimamoto, Kazuhiko', ['Original Creator']], ['Tagashira, Shinobu', ['Character Design']]]
